title: Satou-kun to Tanaka-san: The Blood Highschool
original_name: 佐藤くんと田中さん-The blood highschool
sinopse: Satou is a vampire, 70 years ago he fell in love with a girl, Fumiko, but she rejected him, choosing instead to marry a human. Heartbroken, he vowed to return in 70 years when her husband died and win her again. Now its the present and he's back. Will he succeed in winning Fumiko's heart or will someone else win his.....
